title: What songs are like 'Da Coconut Song'? - Quora

response.answer_text: You're talking about Harry Nilsson. One of the most underrated singer, songwriter and composer of his generation. Once, Dick Cavet interviewed The Beatles and asked each of them what the were listening to. Each in turn responded ‘'Harry Nilsson’’. He was pals with Lennon and Mickey Dolan. As far as I'm aware, there are no other songs really like ‘'The Coconut Song’. Nilsson’s work is amazing. Highly recommend ‘Nilsson Schmilsson’, which is his greatest hits recording. There is also a box set. The documentary about his life was also amazing. He died about 10 years ago after a very hard life.

“Shango's best-known recording was their debut single, a 1969 Caribbean-flavored novelty hit called "Day After Day (It's Slippin' Away)" from their self-titled album Shango on A&M. Produced by Jerry Riopelle and co-written by Riopelle, Stuart Margolin and Reynolds, it mocked contemporary doomsday predictions that California was destined to be destroyed (presumably very soon) by an earthquake.”…!!! Wikipedia…!!!
